1. More than 3 million contracts (from January to November 2021). Save labor cost nearly 10,000 PG.Apply Al tools-identify identity cards, driver's
licenses to save time on data entry.
2. Can handle up to 5,000 transactions/ day with a total amount of up to 30 billion/ day.
Saving nearly 18 billion/ month compared to card payment. Save time and labor in controlling transfer transactions.
Orders are processed in less than 1 second which enhances the customer experience. Limit direct contact during the pandemic. Reducing the risk of cash fund control at supermarkets.
